item.title: Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description:
"People where you live," the little prince said, "grow five thousand roses in one garden... yet they don't find what they're looking for...
They don't find it," I answered.
And yet what they're looking for could be found in a single rose, or a little water..."
Of course," I answered.
And the little prince added, "But eyes are blind. You have to look with the heart." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Geety add a quote by William Glasser
item.description: "We almost always have choices, and the better the choice, the more we will be in control of our lives." -- William Glasser

item.title: Geety add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Geety add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Geety add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Geety add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Geety add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Geety add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "All grown-ups were once children... but only few of them remember it." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "If you love a flower that lives on a star, it is sweet to look at the sky at night. All the stars are a-bloom with flowers..." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "I shall look at you out of the corner of my eye, and you will say nothing. Words are the source of misunderstandings." -from the Fox-" -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "What does tamed mean? It's something that's been too often neglected. It means to create ties." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Geety add a quote by Antoine de Saint Exupéry
item.description: "That is the hardest thing of all. It is much harder to judge yourself than to judge others. If you succeed in judging yourself, it's because you're truly a wise man." -- Antoine de Saint Exupéry

item.title: Geety add a quote by احمد شاملو / Ahmad Shamlou
item.description: "کوه ها با هم اند و تنها یند همچو ما ،با همان تنهایان " -- احمد شاملو / Ahmad Shamlou

item.title: Geety add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Geety add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Geety add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Geety add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Geety add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Geety add a quote by سهراب سپهري
item.description:
"من در اين تاريكي فكر يك بره‌ي روشن هستم كه بيايد علف خستگي‌ام را بچرد.
من در اين تاريكي امتداد تر بازوهايم را زير باراني مي‌بينم كه دعاهاي نخستين بشر را تر كرد.
من در اين تاريكي در گشودم به چمن‌هاي قديم، به طلايي‌هايي، كه به ديوار اساطير تماشا كرديم.
من در اين تاريكي ريشه‌ها را ديدم و براي بته‌ي نورس مرگ، آب را معني كردم." -- سهراب سپهري
